title: I always DC when in a draft que

replies.body: This might be a connection issue, so reinstalling may not necessarily resolve this.  If you lose connection or sync, then you'll get dropped out and end up with a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) penalty.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)  guide to help strengthen your connection and get back in game.  Let me know if you have any questions!
